message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested in the product but $90 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $70?
Hi Bob, I understand that $90 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $82 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. I'm getting closer to what I can afford. Would you be willing to do $75?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to meeting you in the middle, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $79 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
